definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
(Tw) "Yamamoto haircut", similar to a butch cut, but with even length (no tapering on the sides and back), said to be named after Admiral Yamamoto 山本五十六[Shan1 ben3 Wu3 shi2 liu4]

sentences.english: Masao Yamamoto is one of the most internationally influential Japanese photographers.
sentences.chinese: 山本昌男是具有国际影响的日本摄影家之一。

sentences.english: A list of plants of Dr. Y. Yamamoto's last collection.
sentences.chinese: 故山本由松博士最后一次兰屿采集植物目录。

sentences.english: And Mr. Yamamoto can come to my party. I asked him.
sentences.chinese: 山本先生可以参加我的派对，我已经问过他了。

sentences.english: He then asked Tessei if it's ok and he accepted before leaving the room.
sentences.chinese: 之后山本又问了铁斋，他们接受并也离开了会议室。

sentences.english: A photographic exhibition of key photographers who have worked with Yohji Yamamoto.
sentences.chinese: 一个关键的摄影师摄影展谁曾与山本耀司。

sentences.english: Yamamoto found the body of regimental headquarters for a less, he believed that the man will come back.
sentences.chinese: 山本发现团部的尸体少了一具，他相信那人还会回来。

sentences.english: At a restaurant in Tokyo, Sukeyasu Yamamoto orders lunch.
sentences.chinese: 在东京的一个餐馆里，山本先生正在点餐吃中饭。

sentences.english: France and China Law edge below Yamamoto examine the characteristics of chess.
sentences.chinese: 法华律边下边仔细观察山本棋艺的特点。

sentences.english: I'm Yamamoto Mika, a 22-year old Japanese girl.
sentences.chinese: 我是山本美嘉，一个22岁的日本姑娘。
是的，那是葛瑞山本先生。
